body.description: Complete irritation defense. With aloe vera. Complete Irritation Defense: Helps protect against the 5 signs of shaving irritation. Lightly cools to soothe. www.Gillette.com. www.pg.com. how2recycle.info. Comments? 1-800-Gillette or visit www.Gillette.com.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About US As our founder famously said, “We’ll stop making blades when we can’t keep making them better.” We’ve been the leader in shaving innovation since 1901 and don’t plan on stopping any time soon. Developing a handle for every hand, and a blade for every face. Gillette is innovating for you — no matter your shaving needs.
Gillette TRAC II Plus Mens Razor Blade Refills

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Game-Changer for Sensitive Skin: Gillette Series 3X Action Shave Gel Review
reviews.reviewText: As someone with sensitive skin, finding the perfect shaving product has always been a challenge for me. I've tried numerous brands and products, but none of them provided the smooth, irritation-free shave I was looking for. That was until I discovered the Gillette Series 3X Action Shave Gel, Sensitive Twin Pack. This product has truly been a game-changer for me, and I can't recommend it enough.From the moment I first used the Gillette Series 3X Action Shave Gel, I noticed a remarkable difference in my shaving experience. The gel's unique formula, specifically designed for sensitive skin, provided a protective barrier between the razor and my skin, reducing irritation and razor burn significantly. I was finally able to achieve a close, comfortable shave without the uncomfortable aftermath.One of the standout features of this shave gel is its triple action formula, which combines lubricants, emollients, and aloe vera to enhance the shaving experience. The lubricants create a smooth surface for the razor to glide effortlessly, minimizing the chances of nicks and cuts. The emollients moisturize and soften the hair, allowing for a closer shave. And the soothing aloe vera extract calms and nourishes the skin, leaving it feeling refreshed and revitalized after each shave.The twin pack option is an added bonus, providing excellent value for money. Each bottle lasts a long time, and having two at hand ensures I never run out when I need it the most. The convenient packaging is also a plus, as it is travel-friendly and easy to dispense just the right amount of gel without any wastage.Furthermore, the fragrance of the Gillette Series 3X Action Shave Gel is subtle and pleasant. It is not overpowering, which is a relief for those with sensitive noses or who prefer a more neutral scent.In terms of performance, this shave gel surpasses its competitors. The smoothness of the shave, combined with the comfort it provides, makes it my go-to choice every time. Even on days when I have a little extra stubble, this gel effortlessly tackles the job, giving me a clean and flawless shave.Overall, the Gillette Series 3X Action Shave Gel, Sensitive Twin Pack is a top-notch shaving product for individuals with sensitive skin. Its carefully crafted formula, triple action benefits, and soothing properties make it an outstanding choice for anyone looking to achieve a close, irritation-free shave. Say goodbye to redness, razor bumps, and discomfort; this shave gel delivers exceptional results and keeps your skin feeling happy and healthy.If you've struggled with finding the right shaving product for sensitive skin, I highly recommend giving the Gillette Series 3X Action Shave Gel a try. It's a worthy investment that will transform your shaving routine and leave you with a smile on your face and a silky-smooth finish.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars no vienen 6 y ya se esta saliendo el aire
reviews.reviewText: el gel en si es muy bueno porque refresca la piel y hace bastante espuma pero siempre me pasa que con el paso de los dias al usarlo todos los dias se va dañando el pico por donde sale el gel, se va saliendo como el aire que trae el frasco y se va saliendo un poco la espuma. ademas no viene pack de 6 como dice ahi, solo un pack de 2. pero no esta mal pero tampoco le doy un 5
